mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Web3wiki is dedicated to making blockchain and Web3 technology accessible to everyone. We believe that understanding these transformative technologies shouldn't require a computer science degree. Our mission is to provide clear, comprehensive, and interactive educational resources that empower people to confidently navigate the Web3 ecosystem.

what.title: What We Offer
what.content: Web3wiki is your comprehensive learning platform for blockchain technology, cryptocurrency, and decentralized applications. We provide:

features.tutorials: Step-by-step tutorials from beginner to advanced topics
features.interactive: Interactive quizzes and hands-on learning experiences
features.multilingual: Multilingual support (English and Chinese) to reach a global audience
features.community: Community-driven content with feedback and contribution features

free.title: Free & Open
free.description: All our content is completely free and accessible to everyone. No paywalls, no subscriptions.

accessible.title: Beginner-Friendly
accessible.description: We break down complex concepts into easy-to-understand explanations with practical examples.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Coverage
comprehensive.description: From basic blockchain concepts to advanced smart contract development, we cover it all.

interactive.title: Interactive Learning
interactive.description: Test your knowledge with quizzes, contribute improvements, and engage with the content.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Web3wiki is built by developers and educators passionate about blockchain technology. We're committed to creating high-quality educational content and continuously improving based on community feedback.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.content: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you! Connect with us on social media or contribute to our open-source project.
